alert.note: Alert for Brantley; Clinch; Coastal Camden; Coastal Glynn; Echols; Inland Camden; Inland Glynn; Northeastern Charlton; Northern Ware; Southern Ware; Wayne; Western Charlton (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 13 at 6:45PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Nassau, northwestern Baker, northeastern Columbia, northern Hamilton, Camden, Glynn, Echols, Brantley, southeastern Ware, southeastern Wayne, southeastern Clinch and Charlton Counties through 730 PM EDT... At 645 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles southeast of Everett to Homeland to Belmont. Movement was east at 85 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Kingsland, Brunswick, St. Simons Island, Jasper, Hilliard, Folkston, Woodbine, Nahunta, Jennings and Fargo. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM EDT for northern and northeastern Florida...and southeastern Georgia.
